attributes.action: Raise the age limit for riders of Scooters and Mopeds to 18 minimum!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the rising Anti-social behaviour demand that age for a person to ride a Scooter or Moped should be raised to 18 minimum! This would not only cut down on road traffic accidents but noise pollution and Anti-social behaviour.
